This document collects scripts for developing, bug-fixing and pre-release validating a specific function.

## Sourcing

Is the function successfully sourced?

```{r sourcing}

library(OSLdecomposition)
source("../R/plot_SignalCurve.R")

```

## Define signal curves

```{r}
 # ToDo: Create a couple of test curves with wild varity of signal shapes


# Set some arbitrary decay parameter for a dim CW-OSL measurement of quartz
components <- data.frame(name = c("fast", "medium", "slow"),
                         lambda = c(2, 0.5, 0.02),
                         n = c(1000, 1000, 10000))

# Simulate the CW-OSL curve and add some signal noise
curve <- simulate_OSLcomponents(components, simulate.curve = TRUE, 
                                add.poisson.noise = TRUE)

```

## Test raw plot

```{r}

plot_SignalCurve(curve)
plot_SignalCurve(curve, scaling.type = "log")
```
